arts.ttl: Steffen Baumgart: “We weren't the worst team”
arts.sum: Union Berlin’s boss reserved himself from criticizing his team after a third successive defeat for the Irons.

arts.ttl: Resilient Holstein Kiel secure historic away win against Union Berlin
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel clinch their first-ever Bundesliga away victory with a 1-0 win over Union Berlin, courtesy of Armin Gigović's first-half strike, which found no reply in a crucial relegation battle at the Alte Försterei. Union Berlin and Holstein Kiel players scramble for the ball in a crowded penalty area, highlighting the match's intensity - IMAGO/Uwe Koch

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel gets first ever Bundesliga away win, 1-0 at Union Berlin
arts.sum: Union dropped to 14th in the 18-team league, six points above Bochum in the relegation playoff spot, with tough games against Eintracht Frankfurt, Bayern Munich and Freiburg to follow. Union is again appealing against awarding Bochum the win.

arts.ttl: Report | Holstein Kiel Rock Union in Berlin
arts.sum: No side has ever avoided Bundesliga relegation with 13 or fewer points but Holstein Kiel believe they can achieve the impossible after their first away win of the season again…

arts.ttl: Away parties continue with Kiel’s historic win
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel won a Bundesliga away game for the first time in their history with a - success over Union Berlin. If Freiburg win in Augsburg in the ongoing fixture, a new Bundesliga record will be written.

arts.ttl: Relegation Battle at the Bottom of Bundesliga Heats Up as Union Berlin host Holstein Kiel
arts.sum: 14th plays 18th this afternoon in Bundesliga as 1. FC Union Berlin welcomes bottom of the table Holstein Kiel with both sides desperate for victory. Kiel find themselves 8 points…

arts.ttl: Union Berlin’s official appeal of Bochum result contains petition for replay
arts.sum: Due to the fundamental importance for the integrity of the competition and thus for the protection of our club, we will also examine the possibility of taking civil action in parallel,

arts.ttl: Union Berlin vs. Holstein Kiel preview: Can the visitors end wait for away win?
arts.sum: Holstein Kiel will attempt to claim their first-ever Bundesliga away victory when they travel to Stadion An der Alten Försterei for Sunday’s meeting with Union.

arts.ttl: German football fans disagree with Union Berlin-Bochum match ruling
arts.sum: A snap poll from Germany's preeminent footballing publication confirms that the German footballing public disagree with latest ruling awarding VfL Bochum three points in a disputed December Bundesliga fixture with 1. FC Union Berlin.

arts.ttl: Preview: Union Berlin vs. Holstein Kiel - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Union Berlin and Holstein Kiel, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
